description: Enterprise techniques used by Stolen Pencil, ATT&CK group G0086 v1.0
name: Stolen Pencil (G0086)

techniques.comment: [Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has used tools that are capable of obtaining credentials from web browsers.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has a tool to add a Windows admin account in order to allow them to ensure continued access via RDP.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has used tools that are capable of obtaining credentials from saved mail.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) sent spearphishing emails containing links to domains controlled by the threat actor.

[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) victims are prompted to install malicious Google Chrome extensions which gave the threat actor the ability to read data from any website accessed.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) utilized RDP for direct remote point-and-click access.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has a tool to log keystrokes to %userprofile%\appdata\roaming\apach.{txt,log}.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has a tool to add a Windows admin account in order to allow them to ensure continued access via RDP.
[Stolen Pencil](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0086) has a tool to sniff the network for passwords.
